title: Apply Refund to Next Year's Taxes
description: A taxpayer who is due a refund wants to apply it as a credit toward next year's estimated taxes instead of receiving a check.

tasks.description: On Form 1040, enter the refund amount on the line for 'Apply to next year's estimated tax'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills out the appropriate line on the tax form.

tasks.description: Confirm with the taxpayer that they will not receive a direct refund this year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the consequence of their choice.
